detail.description: Finolex Industries Limited (FIL) is a leading manufacturer of PVC Resin and the largest producer of PVC Pipes & Fittings in India. The Company offers the latest range of superior quality and durable PVC-U pipes and fittings used in agriculture, construction and industrial operations. Its product portfolio consists of two major divisions: PVC Resin PVC Pipes & Fittings [1]
